name: Intergalactic Party Shiba
description:
(Hi, this game will have problems running on 32-bit systems and/or browsers with low memory capacity. Also the game ends when Joules says, "I guess...")

The Year 3000 is coming around the corner, and you must help Party Shiba prepare for it!

A week long game jam done by me and my partner. Forgive how short the game is. Please enjoy!
